author: Sarah Kent
title: BP Faces Down Its Doubters
text:
LONDON—BP PLC is struggling to convince investors it can regain its top position among the world’s elite energy players nearly eight years after the Deepwater Horizon disaster.
Chief Executive Bob Dudley has staked his legacy on reversing the company’s lost prestige and turning it from a survivor into a stronger, more profitable company than it was before the 2010 oil spill.
